TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CategoryAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定分類的名稱，該分類會在將 控制項設定為 [分類] 模式時，以群組方式來顯示屬性或事件。

span.span: Specifies the name of the category in which to group the property or event when displayed in a control set to Categorized mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A表示要將相關聯的屬性或事件，建立關聯的類別目錄列出屬性或事件時控制項設定為模式。A indicates the category to associate the associated property or event with, when listing properties or events in a control set to mode. 如果尚未套用至屬性或事件將其與相關聯**其他**類別目錄。If a has not been applied to a property or event, the associates it with the **Misc** category. 新的類別可建立的任何名稱，藉由建構函式中指定的類別目錄名稱。A new category can be created for any name by specifying the name of the category in the constructor for the . 屬性會指出此屬性代表類別目錄的名稱。The property indicates the name of the category that the attribute represents. 屬性也會提供透明的當地語系化類別目錄名稱。The property also provides transparent localization of category names. ## Examples 下列範例會建立`MyImage`屬性。The following example creates the `MyImage` property. 此屬性有兩個屬性：和。The property has two attributes: a and a . [!code-cpp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一個範例中取得的分類`MyImage`。The next example gets the category for `MyImage`. 首先，此程式碼取得含有物件的所有屬性。First, the code gets a with all the properties for the object. 接下來，程式碼索引至以取得`MyImage`。Next, the code indexes into the to get `MyImage`. 然後它會傳回這個屬性的屬性，並將它們儲存在變數中`attributes`。Then it returns the attributes for this property and saves them in the variable `attributes`. 這個範例接著會分類列印藉由擷取從，和寫入至主控台畫面。The example then prints the category by retrieving from the , and writing it to the console screen. [!code-cpp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.para:
如果您使用預先定義的名稱以外的類別目錄名稱，而且您想要當地語系化類別目錄名稱，您必須覆寫方法。類別會定義下列的通用類別目錄： 類別描述
可用動作的相關屬性。
相關實體的顯示方式的屬性。
如何處理實體與相關的屬性。
與資料和資料來源管理相關的屬性。
預設類別目錄分組的屬性。
只能在設計階段的屬性。
拖放作業相關的屬性。
焦點相關的屬性。
與格式相關的屬性。
與鍵盤相關的屬性。
版面配置與相關的屬性。
與滑鼠相關的屬性。
與最上層的表單的視窗樣式相關屬性。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

If you use category names other than the predefined names, and you want to localize your category names, you must override the method. The class defines the following common categories: Category Description
Properties related to available actions.
Properties related to how an entity appears.
Properties related to how an entity acts.
Properties related to data and data source management.
Properties that are grouped in a default category.
Properties that are available only at design time.
Properties related to drag-and-drop operations.
Properties related to focus.
Properties related to formatting.
Properties related to the keyboard.
Properties related to layout.
Properties related to the mouse.
Properties related to the window style of top-level forms. For more information, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用分類名稱 Default 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the category name Default.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string category) cil managed

span.span: The name of the category.

summary.span: 使用指定的類別名稱來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified category name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您提供的名稱`category`參數的其中一個預先定義的類別名稱，名稱會由自動當地語系化屬性。If the name you provide for the `category` parameter is one of the predefined category names, the name will be automatically localized by the property. 如果您提供的名稱不是預先定義的類別名稱，而且您不會覆寫方法，以提供當地語系化的名稱，類別名稱就不得當地語系化。If the name you provide is not a predefined category name, and you do not override the method to provide a localized name, the category name will not be localized.

span.span: The name of the category for the property or event that this attribute is applied to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性呼叫第一次存取時取得類別的當地語系化的名稱。This property calls to get the localized name of the category the first time it is accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetLocalizedString(string value) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetLocalizedString (value As String) As String
abstract member GetLocalizedString : string -> string override this.GetLocalizedString : string -> string

param.name: value
param.span: 所要查閱分類的識別項。

span.span: The identifer for the category to look up.

summary.span: 查閱指定分類的當地語系化名稱。

span.span: Looks up the localized name of the specified category.

returns.span: 分類的當地語系化名稱，或者如果沒有當地語系化名稱時則為 。

span.span: The localized name of the category, or if a localized name does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性就會呼叫這個方法，第一次存取查閱指定分類的當地語系化名稱。The property calls this method the first time it is accessed to look up the localized name for the specified category.

span.para: 覆寫這個方法，以將您自己的當地語系化的名稱加入至分類。當地語系化的字串是否可針對給定的值，此方法應該傳回它。否則會呼叫基底類別的讓當地語系化字串的基底類別的方法。

Override this method to add your own localized names to categories. If a localized string is available for the given value, the method should return it. Otherwise, call the base class's method to let the base class localize the string.
